stories.text:
I have a backend API and some test data representing real clients. I can write a wrk script that loops through the test data and sends requests to the backend. However, my development machine is network/connection limited so I'd like to run this on some cloud provisioned platform. What's the simplest tool or PaaS that would meet these needs? It doesn't have to be the most cost effective, I simply need the ability to run many instances of my wrk script.

https://github.com/wg/wrk
stories.title: Ask HN: What's the simplest way to run load tests?
ML Assisted Troubleshooting – Unsupervised Anomaly Detection in Netdata

stories.text:
What topics do you suggest for creating a college-level business-technology innovation course?

The goal is a 40-hour course that gives a feel of Hacker News such as "What is a MVP?" and "How to plan a roadmap" and the like. I'm seeking ideas from HN about topics, tactics, techniques, and the like.

The target audience is a mix of business-track students and compsci-track students.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What topics for a business-technology innovation course?
